attributes.action: prevent the closure of a swimming pool within a sports college/foundation school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition is to stop the closure of a well used community pool, which an establish social enterprise would like to work in partnership with the school.  The facility has 18 primary schools, a number of adult learning centres and over 500 children on the learn to swim scheme accessing the facility.  This contravenes the Education and Inspection Act 2006, by way of the foundation school should be working with the community and that a sports college is disgarding the sport of swimming and related activities.
